```{r}
installPackages <- function (myRPackage){
  if(require(myRPackage, character.only=TRUE)){
    cat("Package ", myRPackage, "is already installed.\n")
  }else{
     install.packages(myRPackage, dep=TRUE, quiet = TRUE)
  }
}
# installPackages("GGally")
```

# Paquets generals

```{r}
genPacks<- c("dplyr", "MASS", "ggplot2", "ggpubr")
out<- sapply(genPacks, installPackages)
```




# Paquets de classificacio

```{r}
classifPacks<- c("rpart","ISLR","caret","mlbench","AmesHousing","ipred","rsample","ipred","randomForest","ranger","gbm","xgboost")
```
